attributes.action: Only make those on furlough pay extra in tax
attributes.background: As a NHS worker who has been working the whole pandemic. I know we deserve to not pay extra in taxes as we haven’t claimed any sort of claim/furlough during this pandemic.

rejection.details:
It is not clear what 'extra tax' you are referring to. 

You could start a petition calling for specified tax breaks or exemptions for key workers including NHS staff, if that is something you'd like to happen.

In the meantime you may like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333517
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315912
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554019
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818
